item.title: Creating a Theme from Scratch
item.description: While I like many themes from the corresponding hugo page, with this post I start creating a new theme for my own site, with the goal to explore and use some CSS (and Markdown/Hugo, of course). For simplcity, I start from a completely new site with hugo: hugo new site from_scratch The folder themes is empty. Normally, I would clone an existing theme, and start configuring. In this example, however, I want to work step by step.
